abce.ecj
Class EvaluationGroup

java.lang.Object
  abce.ecj.EvaluationGroup

public class EvaluationGroup
extends java.lang.Object

An evaluation group is simply a container that holds which individuals in a population should be included in a Problem, and which ones should have their fitnesses evaluated.

Author:
ruppmatt
